name: Undying (J.Omar)
description:
A game dedicated to my wife for our anniversary.

You play as Hap, you've been alive for who knows how long stuck on an island with a wandering castle that appears once every year. Your wife Yen has been trapped in this castle, this is the year you save her! 

* This is a Jam build I wanted to create over the month of October, please message me with any feedback to improve the game! 

*Controls:

 "Z" action one.

 "X" action two.

Arrow Keys for Movement.

Space to Pause.

"R" to Restart.

Escape to Quit.

Art and Programming by me.
